mapper.sql: ID, FileNum, OpretaCertNum, PlateNum, CorpName, OwnerName, OrigOwnerName, OrigPlateNum, EmployPerson, Color, Sign, SealRecord, Address, PhoneNum, IDNumber, OwnerChange, DrvLicenseDate, VehicleInspRec, OwnerNamePic, VehiclePic, TonsSeat, CarLen, CarWidth, CarHigh, FrameNumber, EngineNumber, ADDTIME, CheckDate, TransferDate
id, operatingnum, annualdate, nextannualdate, vehicle, addtime, status
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_TAXICAR
AND PlateNum LIKE '%'+#{PlateNum}+'%'
AND OpretaCertNum LIKE '%'+#{OpretaCertNum}+'%'
AND OrigOwnerName LIKE '%'+#{OrigOwnerName}+'%'
ORDER BY ADDTIME DESC

SELECT
FROM TB_TAXICAR
AND ID = #{id}
AND PlateNum LIKE '%'+#{PlateNum}+'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TAXICAR ( id,FileNum, OpretaCertNum, PlateNum, CorpName, OwnerName, OrigOwnerName, OrigPlateNum, EmployPerson, Color, Sign, SealRecord, Address, PhoneNum, IDNumber, OwnerChange, DrvLicenseDate, VehicleInspRec, OwnerNamePic, VehiclePic, TonsSeat, CarLen, CarWidth, CarHigh, FrameNumber, EngineNumber, ADDTIME, CheckDate, TransferDate ) VALUES ( #{id},#{fileNum},#{opretaCertNum},#{plateNum},#{corpName},#{ownerName} ,#{origOwnerName},#{origPlateNum},#{employPerson},#{color},#{sign}, #{sealRecord},#{address},#{phoneNum},#{iDNumber},#{ownerChange}, #{drvLicenseDate},#{vehicleInspRec},#{ownerNamePic},#{vehiclePic}, #{tonsSeat},#{carLen},#{carWidth},#{carHigh},#{frameNumber},#{engineNumber}, getdate(),#{checkDate},#{transferDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_TAXICAR SET FileNum=#{fileNum}, opretaCertNum=#{opretaCertNum}, PlateNum=#{plateNum}, CorpName=#{corpName}, OwnerName=#{ownerName}, OrigOwnerName=#{origOwnerName}, OrigPlateNum=#{origPlateNum}, EmployPerson=#{employPerson}, Color=#{color}, Sign=#{sign}, SealRecord=#{sealRecord}, Address=#{address}, PhoneNum=#{phoneNum}, IDNumber=#{iDNumber}, OwnerChange=#{ownerChange}, DrvLicenseDate=#{drvLicenseDate}, VehicleInspRec=#{vehicleInspRec}, OwnerNamePic=#{ownerNamePic}, VehiclePic=#{vehiclePic}, TonsSeat=#{tonsSeat}, CarLen=#{carLen}, CarWidth=#{carWidth}, CarHigh=#{carHigh}, FrameNumber=#{frameNumber}, EngineNumber=#{engineNumber}, CheckDate=#{checkDate}, TransferDate=#{transferDate} WHERE ID = #{ id }
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_TAXICAR_CHECK
AND operatingnum LIKE '%'+#{operatingnum}+'%'
ORDER BY ADDTIME DESC

SELECT
FROM TB_TAXICAR_CHECK where status=1 or status=2 or status=3
AND operatingnum LIKE '%'+#{operatingnum}+'%'
ORDER BY ADDTIME DESC
